meanings.definition: A type of shrub or small tree with fragrant yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The hamamelis in our garden smells lovely.
meanings.sent2: I planted a hamamelis in my backyard for its beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The hamamelis in the park seemed to be showing off its bright blooms.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a hamamelis in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The hamamelis added a splash of color to the otherwise green garden.

meanings.definition: An astringent lotion or extract made from the bark or leaves of the hamamelis plant.
meanings.sent1: I use hamamelis to soothe my skin after shaving.
meanings.sent2: The hamamelis extract helped reduce the redness on my face.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the hamamelis lotion made her feel like a superhero with invincible skin.
meanings.sent4: The hamamelis astringent was a magic potion for her acne.
meanings.sent5: The hamamelis extract tightened her pores like a gentle hug for her face.
